name: kaesang_check_system
description: System check workflow using tmux, summarize skill, and Agent Kaesang (simulated via default agent)

steps.name: system_check
steps.goal: Create a new detached tmux session named 'kaesang_session', run the command 'uname -a', wait for 2 seconds, and then capture and return the text output from the pane.

steps.name: summarize_info
steps.goal: Summarize the system information provided in this text: {{system_check_output}}

steps.name: kaesang_comment
steps.goal: Berperanlah sebagai Kaesang Pangarep (anak muda santai, pengusaha pisang, gaya bicara slengean, suka bercanda, logat jawa halus dikit). Komentari hasil system check ini dengan gayamu: {{summarize_info_output}}
